description: This file defines an Angular component 'RecipeListComponent' responsible for displaying a list of recipes with search functionality. It includes template markup for search input, loading skeletons, recipe cards, and no-results message. The component fetches recipe data via 'RecipeService' based on query parameters and manages subscriptions to route parameters.

classes.name: RecipeListComponent
classes.description: Angular component that displays a list of recipes with search capabilities, handling route query parameters and recipe data.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component by subscribing to route query parameters and triggering recipe fetch.

methods.name: ngOnDestroy
methods.description: Unsubscribes from route parameter subscription to avoid memory leaks.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches recipes from the service based on the current search query.

methods.name: onQueryChange
methods.description: Handler for when the search query input changes; currently a placeholder.

methods.name: applySearch
methods.description: Updates the URL with the current search query to trigger recipe filtering.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the search query and updates URL accordingly.
